headline: Assessing Vistra’s Recent Surge After Clean Energy Acquisition: Is the Stock Priced Right in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Vistra is a hidden bargain or simply playing catch-up? If you are curious about whether the stock is priced right in today’s market, you are definitely not alone. Vistra’s shares have surged 6.1% over the past week, but they are still down 10.3% for the month. This highlights both growth potential and changing market risk perceptions. Over the past year, the stock has returned 12.5%, with substantial gains of nearly 950% over the last five years. Recent headlines point to...
